name: Musical Line - Rhythm Game
description:
As a free music classical piano rhythm game, Musical Line combines Music game with 3D Scenes to create amazing visual effects and addictive gameplay!
Come on, control your line, and start dancing like a snake!

Game rules:
Avoid obstacles and traps while you maneuver through the unpredictable world of Music! Listen to the fast beat and the melody. Tap the screen to make a sharp turn, Collect coins far as possible!

Gameplay:
Guide an ever-growing Line through multiple environments, listening carefully to the music. Tap the screen to make a sharp turn, avoiding obstacles and reacting to the World changing before your eyes.

Game features:
- Perfect melodies and amazing background music
- Music game with only one finger tap
- Perfectly synced music.
- Rich scenes

Download this music game now. Let the Musical Line dance with you
